uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.objects

Class DrivingLicense

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.objects.DrivingLicense

  • public class DrivingLicense
extends java.lang.Object

    Driving License

    The class represents Driving License's and ensures that they are unique. Use the getInstance() method to construct or fetch a Driving licence.
    Author:
    Jonathan Carlton

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DrivingLicense getInstance(Person person,
                                         java.util.Date second,
                                         boolean fullLicense)
        Static factory method to either create a new DrivingLicense or fetch a previously created one.
        Parameters:
        person - the Person whose license it is.
        second - the Date of which the license was issued.
        fullLicense - if it's a full license or not.
        Returns:
        the stored or created object.
